@graph.name: Galaxy Workflow Galaxy Hi C
@graph.description:
Hi-C analysis of Drosophila melanogaster cells using HiCExplorer

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Galaxy Workflow Galaxy Hi C](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/epigenetics/tutorials/hicexplorer/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
